summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via a single-page App with a labeled Button component and custom Tailwind-based theme tokens. However, the diff also introduces unrequested authentication/actor infrastructure, a backend actor file, and an external attribution link.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and related login/logout infrastructure
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication/Internet Identity flows as non-goals, and the core request only asks for a do-nothing button UI.
Constraints state no backend changes are required; the request is purely frontend UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Actor creation/querying via react-query and identity-dependent actor recreation
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces backend interaction scaffolding beyond the do-nothing button UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution with external link to caffeine.ai and dynamic window.location hostname usage
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; also introduces an external outbound link/service reference outside the minimal button UI scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional global CSS file at frontend/index.css with a different/default token palette alongside frontend/src/index.css
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and may conflict with the requirement for a coherent, consistent theme by introducing two different sets of design tokens.
